rgbBuffer - Variable in class anip.APDecoder
The decoded frame as a 24-bit RGB image, type of an int array where data is coded in order java.awt.image.BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB.
rgbSpace - Variable in class anip.mediancut.ArrayMedianCut
Number of occurrences of every possible RGB combination in the image, a "RGB space".
rgbSpaceIsCleared - Variable in class anip.mediancut.ArrayMedianCut
Determines whether contents of rgbSpace must be cleared before colors can be counted for the next median cut operation.
